sentences.english: I promise never to eat more than one serving of okra again.
sentences.chinese: 我保證我以後最多就只吃一份秋葵。

sentences.english: I'll just finish eating your gumbo for you.
sentences.chinese: 我會替你把秋葵湯喝完。
什錦菜，河蝦派，秋葵加肉片。

sentences.english: The ground was covered with okra paint, enhancing the redness of theplace.
sentences.chinese: 地面鋪滿秋葵的圖案，加重了祭壇內部的紅色調。

sentences.english: Why not a site dedicated to gumbo pudding pops?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不致力於秋葵布丁網站彈出？

sentences.english: Okra, which also contains calcium, is an aid in reducing stomach inflammations .
sentences.chinese: 包含鈣的秋葵，也有助於抵抗胃炎症。

sentences.english: Okra is a popular vegetable in Sri Lanka.
sentences.chinese: 秋葵在斯里蘭卡是很受歡迎的蔬菜。

sentences.english: Gumbo is a thick soup that originated in New Orleans.
sentences.chinese: 秋葵湯是一種很稠的湯，它最初起源於新奧爾良。

sentences.english: I'll make a point to trying new food like okra gumbo.
sentences.chinese: 我要讓點，嘗試新的食物秋葵秋葵湯一樣。

sentences.english: I'll make a point to trying new food like okra gumbo.
sentences.chinese: 我要讓點，嘗試新的食物秋葵秋葵湯一樣。

sentences.english: Jambalaya and a crawfish pie and fillet gumbo.
sentences.chinese: 什錦菜，小龍蝦派，秋葵加肉片。

sentences.english: Surprisingly, I didn't try it until just two years ago–and it was great.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次嘗秋葵湯是在兩年前，口味真的很不錯。

sentences.english: But you haven't tasted my gumbo. How you doing, cutie ?
sentences.chinese: 但是你還沒有嘗過我做的秋葵湯你好嗎小可愛？
什錦飯，河蝦派，肉片秋葵。

sentences.english: When in the South , eat okra .
sentences.chinese: 當人在南方時，要喫秋葵。
什錦飯，河蝦派，肉片秋葵。

definition: Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
variant of 芥藍|芥蓝[gai4 lan2]
eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
